    • Uses of Ship in Battleship

      Fields in Battleship declared as Ship 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Ship[] GameHelper.shipsArray
      A Ship Array that holds the different types of ship instances.
      Methods in Battleship that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship[] GameHelper.createShipsArray()
      This method simply initializes the shipArray, and other classes making their own ShipArray[] with different instances of the ships at different indexes.
      Ship GameHelper.hasSunk(java.awt.Color c, java.lang.String who)
      This method checks if any ships remain of a specific color on the board.
      Methods in Battleship with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void User.setShips(Ship[] ships)
      This abstract method is to be defined by each User for its own needs.
      void Player.setShips(Ship[] ships)
      This method iterates through the inputed Ship[].
      void Computer.setShips(Ship[] ships)
      This method iterates through the inputed Ship[].
      void User.setShipsHelper(Ship s)
      This method randomly generates a number between 0 and 1.
      void Player.setShipsHelper(Ship s)
      This method randomly generates a number between 0 and 1.
      void Computer.setShipsHelper(Ship s)
      This method randomly generates a number between 0 and 1.
